name: Huzaifa Abdulrab
title: Frontend Developer & Agentic AI Developer
about: I’m a passionate frontend developer skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, n8n, and Agentic AI automation. I build visually stunning, high-performance, responsive web applications with clean code and modern UI/UX.
quote: I believe great design isn’t just how it looks — it’s how it feels and performs.
